nodes.text: Trap Door was a Beta-class ETR-3 escort transport deployed by the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.
Trap Door was utilized to lay mines around a Rebel Alliance supply cache containing warheads, hidden in the Obran Cluster, hoping to ambush any recovery operation.

The Rebels, although fully aware of the trap in place, sent a team regardless with A-wings from Blue Squadron to clear the minefield and hold off Assault Gunboats long enough for their Heavy Lifters Beetle Group to pick up at least one of the containers. Trap Door became a participant in the battle.
Trap Door appears in Star Wars: X-Wing vs. TIE Fighter. The outcome of the battle depends on which side the player takes, although Trap Door does not have to survive for the Imperial player to win.
